attributes.action: Ban homework or atleast most of it
attributes.additional_details: If students want they can decide if they want to do homework it should not be mandatary and we think that teachers should teach this in the classrooms.
attributes.background: We urge the government to cut down most homework to stop students from stressing as it takes up their free time and they already spend about 6 hours and 30 minutes in the classroom.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Ban homework in all schools 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/742337
